survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Hybrid Vehicle Adoption Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and barriers regarding the adoption of hybrid vehicles to help manufacturers and policymakers better address market needs.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing a hybrid vehicle within the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly drop-down options.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize answer order to mitigate bias.
